title: PLENICE JUNIOR PLUS 6 16KG+, AIR DRY, VIOLETA DOUBLE CARE, 48/1

ingredient-information.sestavine: Top-sheet NW: bicomponenet fiber polypropilene/polyethylene, 2nd top-sheet NW: polypropilene/polyethylene fibers, Acquisition - SPOOL: polyester/bico copolyester/ polyester fibers, Core-Wrap NW - upper: cellulose, Core-Wrap NW - lower: polypropylene, Cellulose: cellulose, SAP: superabsorbent poylmer (crosslinked, partially neutralized copolymer of acrylicacid), Back-sheet NW: 100% BICO PE/PET, Back-sheet Poly: polyethylene, Leg-cuffs NW: polypropylene, Cuffs elastics: spandex/elastane fiber, Leg-elastics: spandex/elastane fiber, Frontal Tape: polypropylene nonwoven/polyethylene film, Front-Ear material: polypropylene, Hooks - SPOOL: polypropylene nonwoven/polyethylene film, Back-Ear material: elastic film + polypropylene on both sides, adhesive: Hot melt adhesive.
